extendedInfo.description: Simply Done helps you remember about important tasks.Organize your tasks in categories and use colorful icons to decorate them. Prioritize your tasks or set due dates to make sure you won't miss anything important.Simply Done provides six different color versions of widgets which you can use to display tasks for each category.Simply Done also recognizes tasks directly from the SMS and automatically adds them to your to-do list!-----Visit our official site at http://chiralcode.comFollow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/chiralcodeLike us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/chiralcode

reviews.comment:
BEST!

Here is what you can add:
-Progress bar
-Ability to make category within category
-Priority can be set to 1,2,3 or 1 big star, plz add no star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really nice
reviews.comment: I have downloaded a lot of to do apps and none get close to the UI of this app. This is simple, intuitive and effective. Make it synchronize to the web so I can access it at my PC and it gets 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Beautiful animated todo list . Can\'t wait for future updates,Very useful and easy to use . Pls add task reodering . Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great but Cannot back up on SD! Would rate 5 stars if subcategory notes could b added for shopping lists!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very functional
reviews.comment: Simple, clear and effective. Icons help with efficiency.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for me
reviews.comment: Asks for too many permissions.  Can take awhile to load pages.  After adding tasks, it sometimes gets stuck trying to save the data.  Good basic to do list but I have found others that have more features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Searched all over to find a todo app i liked. Love this. Would be a 5 if didnt take so long to load pages. LG Ally
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A great start. Looking forward to more features. Nice UI.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force close on every use- Samsung Intercept
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I loved this app...but......
reviews.comment: This is a great app....it has everything I was looking for, but after putting in all the categories you can\'t reorder them. When I tried to delete a category or rename,  it crashed and stop working. The fonts are also too small and there is no option to set the size. I uninstalled and re-installed the app hoping it would not crash, but it did. I also do not like phone contacts permissions...too nosy for me. Until these glitches are fixed I had to uninstall and  move on. I reported it to the developer........I hope the dev is listening.
reviews.author: A Google User
